text:
What are the odds
that the vulnerability in the tool to fix what they broke while trying to fix
the original vulnerability is the same as the original vulnerability they were
trying to fix? " Hey, we've already got code to do that, just paste this in."
Come on guys, give us a break! -- There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ -----Original
Message-----
Link: None

metadata.topic: Microsoft Printer Metadata Troubleshooter Tool Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
